metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42327 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: x86: unintended memory sharing between guests On Intel systems that supportthe "virtualize APIC accesses" feature, a guest can read and write theglobal shared xAPIC page by moving the local APIC out of xAPIC mode. Accessto this shared page bypasses the expected isolation that should existbetween two guests.

criterions.comment: xen package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
